sentence.Network_en: Perishables are stacked on deck under cover, awaiting rigid inspection before they are struck below.

sentence.Network_en: Sorry, these perishables are not allowed to bring in.
sentence.Network_cn: 对不起, 这些易腐烂的东西是不允许入境的.

sentence.Network_en: Officer: Well, perhaps. But perishables are also not allowed.
sentence.Network_cn: 官员: 是吗, 也许吧. 但易腐烂的东西也是不能带进来的.
